entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 7 April 2023
